title: Gustav Conrad Bauer
summary: Gustav Conrad Bauer (18 November 1820, Augsburg â€“ 3 April 1906, Munich) was a German mathematician,[1] known for the Bauer-Muir transformation[2][3] and Bauer's conic sections.
